Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials, ensuring it exceeds industry standards and offers unparalleled performance. Given its exceptional features and benefits, we believe its true value lies well beyond $15000. Considering the unique advantages it provides, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $20000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment that could significantly impact your operations or personal endeavors. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to potentially working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
